text.autoconfig.stacker.title: Stacker Config
text.autoconfig.stacker.option.maxStacke: Do not set larger than 2147483647 or below 1
§cAll changes are applied instantly and do not need a restart!
text.autoconfig.stacker.option.fontOverr: Set this to §aYes §fif you want font size to scale with amount
text.autoconfig.stacker.option.itemCount: Only applies if Variable Font Override is set to §cNo
text.autoconfig.stacker.option.itemIgnor: Don't change the stack size of: (Format: §fmod:name §ror §f#tag:name§r)
text.autoconfig.stacker.option.itemOverr: Change the stack size of, separate from the max stack size: (Format: §fmod:name:amount §ror §f#tag:name:amount§r)
